main.name: Goh Jia Yi, Jesa
bio: Hi there! I am Jia Yi and I go by Jesa as well. Currently a final-year Business Analytics undergraduate at National University of Singapore (NUS), expected to graduate in July 2022. I love all things data and my passion lies within Machine Learning and Analytics.

When I was young, I started dabbling around in HTML and CSS which sparked my interest in the field of technology. With strong interests in technopreneurship, I hope to create something impactful with my skills for the greater good.
main.contactmessage: I would love to hear from you, let's chat!

education.degree: Bachelor of Science (BSc.) in Business Analytics

work.title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern
description: Boosted document processing efficiency by automating classification and quality checks with 96% precision.
Enhanced information extraction application to reach 92% accuracy through regression testing and analysis.
Researched, designed, and implemented scalable applications.

work.title: Machine Learning Engineer Intern
description: Streamlined Individual Physical Proficiency Test (IPPT) processes by building an exercise detection and rep counting application.
